name: Latest Post Shortcode Slider
author: Iulia Cazan

sections.description:
The plugin is an extension for the Latest Post Shortcode plugin, and allows you to output the static or dynamical selection you make as a responsive slider with different configuration.

Latest Post Shortcode

  • https://wordpress.org/plugins/latest-post-shortcode

Hooks

admin_enqueue_scripts, init, plugins_loaded, media_buttons_context, admin_footer, admin_head, wp_head

License

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

Version history

2.2 – Tested up to 4.8.2, add support for Latest Post Shortcode 7.4
2.1 – Add support for Latest Post Shortcode 7.3
2.0 – Tested up to 4.8, compatible with Latest Post Shortcode 7.0
1.1 – Add status support.
1.0 – Initial version.
sections.installation:
• Upload Latest Post Shortcode Slider Extension to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your application
  • Login as Admin
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
None

Installation Instructions

  • Upload Latest Post Shortcode Slider Extension to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your application
  • Login as Admin
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

upgrade_notice: Chars limit, custom "read more" option and different tile patterns in the new version! You should upgrade, it's free! Donation and reviews are welcomed and will help me to continue future development.
